Hull (1942-2008) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
A mụrụ ya na 1942 na McAdams, Mississippi
Ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ afọ na Kosciusko, Mississippi
Ónyé na-ese ihe n'onwe ya, ọ malitere ise ihe na ijikọta ihe n'ụlọ ya na ogige ya na 1975. N'etiti ihe ndị a gbakọtara bụ hubcaps, akpụkpọ ụkwụ na akara. L.V

Mgbè ọ nwụsịrị, e mere mgbalị iji chekwaa saịtị ahụ na ihe ndị ahụ, mana n'agbanyeghị onyinye sitere na American Folklore Society, itinye aka nke Mississippi Arts Commission, na ịmepụta The Friends of L.V
ọrụ ahụ enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma
Ụlọ ahụ nọ n'ime mmebi na ónyé nwe ya bụ ihe a na-enyo enyo
N'ime usoro nke ịhazi ónyé nwe ya, ụlọ ahụ dakwasịrị n'ime mmebi ọzọ
sere foto iji dekọọ otú ụlọ na ogige ahụ si pụta mgbè Hull dị ndụ na ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ahụ ka a kwagara n'ụlọ nzukọ ọbọdọ Kosciusko.
Foto Vaughn Sills nkè 2001 nkè ubi ya dị na Smithsonian American Art Museum
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke usoro Places for the Spirit, Traditional African American Gardens of the South.
